TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetController( player ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, player ) player:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_SACRIFICE", EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
